|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192CE; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/11/2011 |estreldate = 04/29/2011 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 810731011929 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = B004YL54WA |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The PCI ID for this device is probably 10ec:8178.
*The card used for this device is used for :the [http://www.encore-usa.com/pl/product/ENEWI-2XN42 ENEWI-2XN42] (2dBi antennas included) and :the [http://www.encore-usa.com/ca/taxonomy/term/465/all Encore ENEWI-2XN45] (5dBi antennas included).
